home.one:
1) Select your active character
2) Change your character’s name

forest.one:
1) Rabbit(💰 1+)
2) Goblin 👺 (💰 50)
3) Wolf 🐺 (💰 1)
4) Troll 👻 (💰 300)
5) Giant 🗿 (💰 3000)

1) Buy characters 🐧 
2) Buy 💰 5000 with 100 pylons
3) Sell 💰  from orderbook / place order to buy 💰 
4) Buy 💰  from orderbook / place order to sell 💰

6) Buy 🗡️  from orderbook / place order to sell 🗡️

develop.one:
Create cookbook(j)
Switch user(z)
Get initial py)lons
DevMode Test Items(b)

home desc.one:
Estás en inicio.
Si quieres cazar, dirígete al bosque.
Y si quieres comprar/vender algo, dirígete a la tienda.

home desc without pylon.one:
You don't have pylon within account.
To buy characters, you need to purchase pylons or sell existing characters/items on market to get pylons.

home desc without character.one:
You don't have any character yet.
You can buy one from market or at the shop

forest desc.one:
Estás en el bosque.
Puedes cazar aquí o regresar a inicio.

shop desc.one:
It’s a blacksmith’s store.
The blacksmith sells things, buys things, and mends things.
Sometimes he regrets his choices in life.

pylons central desc.one:
Ahora estás en un mercado.
Puedes comerciar aquí por monedas y artículos.

develop desc.one: You are now testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try

help desc.one: This is help page for LOUD game.

select buy character desc.one:
You are gonna buy a character.
Please select a character to buy.

select buy item desc.one: Swords are big and clever. Big. And. Clever.

select sell item desc.one: Sell some stuff. Make money, get britches. We’re pretty sure that’s how it works.

rabbits without sword outcome.one:
Hunt Rabbits

Reward 💰 1 - 2
5% chance of character dying

goblin outcome.one:
Fight Goblin 👺

Goblins don't have much money but they have a high chance to drop their ear.

Reward 💰 50
Enemy info (HP: 10, Attack: 1)
2% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
20% chance of getting "Goblin ear"

wolf outcome.one:
Fight Wolf 🐺

Wolves don't have any money so they don't drop gold.
But they drop wolf tail instead, which can be sold for gold, or it might be an ingredient of bronze sword recipe

Reward 💰 1
Enemy info (HP: 15, Attack: 3)
3% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
40% chance of getting "Wolf tail"

troll outcome.one:
Fight Troll 👻

Trolls don't really drop their toes but they might have a lot of gold because they eat unlucky travellers

Reward 💰 300
Enemy info (HP: 20, Attack: 5)
4% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Troll toes"

giant outcome.one:
Fight Giant 🗿 

Reward 💰 3000
Enemy info (HP: 100, Attack: 10)
5% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of bonus skill
Hmm.. 4%, 3%, 3% for fire, ice, acid
🗿 (GiantKiller) badget on character

fire dragon outcome.one:
Fight Fire Dragon 🦐

Reward 💰 10000
Enemy info (HP: 300, Attack: 30)
2% chance for character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Fire scale"
FireDragonKiller badget on character

ice dragon outcome.one:
Fight Ice Dragon 🦈

Reward 💰 10000
Enemy info (HP: 300, Attack: 30)
2% chance for character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Icy shards"
IceDragonKiller badget on character

acid dragon outcome.one:
Fight acid dragon 🐊

Reward 💰 10000
Enemy info (HP: 300, Attack: 30)
2% chance for character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Poison claws"
AcidDragonKiller badget on character

undead dragon outcome.one:
Fight undead dragon 🐉

Reward 💰 50000
Enemy info (HP: 300, Attack: 30)
2% chance for character dying
3% chance of sword lose
UndeadDragonKiller badget on character
